name: TraceServiceClient
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
V1
TraceServiceClient
description: This file describes an API for collecting and viewing traces and spans within a trace. A Trace is a collection of spans corresponding to a single operation or set of operations for an application. A span is an individual timed event which forms a node of the trace tree. Spans for a single trace may span multiple services.

params.name: service_path
params.description: The domain name of the API remote host.

params.name: port
params.description: The port on which to connect to the remote host.

params.name: channel
params.description: A Channel object through which to make calls.

params.name: chan_creds
params.description: A ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

methods.name: patch_traces
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
V1
TraceServiceClient#patch_traces
methods.description: Sends new traces to Stackdriver Trace or updates existing traces. If the ID of a trace that you send matches that of an existing trace, any fields in the existing trace and its spans are overwritten by the provided values, and any new fields provided are merged with the existing trace data. If the ID does not match, a new trace is created.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/trace/v1/trace_service_client"

TraceServiceClient = Google::Cloud::Trace::V1::TraceServiceClient
Traces = Google::Devtools::Cloudtrace::V1::Traces

trace_service_client = TraceServiceClient.new
project_id = ''
traces = Traces.new
trace_service_client.patch_traces(project_id, traces)

params.name: project_id
params.description: ID of the Cloud project where the trace data is stored.

params.name: traces
params.description: The body of the message.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: get_trace
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
V1
TraceServiceClient#get_trace
methods.description: Gets a single trace by its ID.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/trace/v1/trace_service_client"

TraceServiceClient = Google::Cloud::Trace::V1::TraceServiceClient

trace_service_client = TraceServiceClient.new
project_id = ''
trace_id = ''
response = trace_service_client.get_trace(project_id, trace_id)

params.name: project_id
params.description: ID of the Cloud project where the trace data is stored.

params.name: trace_id
params.description: ID of the trace to return.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: list_traces
title: Google
Cloud
Trace
V1
TraceServiceClient#list_traces
methods.description: Returns of a list of traces that match the specified filter conditions.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/trace/v1/trace_service_client"

TraceServiceClient = Google::Cloud::Trace::V1::TraceServiceClient

trace_service_client = TraceServiceClient.new
project_id = ''

# Iterate over all results.
trace_service_client.list_traces(project_id).each do |element|
  # Process element.
end

# Or iterate over results one page at a time.
trace_service_client.list_traces(project_id).each_page do |page|
  # Process each page at a time.
  page.each do |element|
    # Process element.
  end
end

params.name: project_id
params.description: ID of the Cloud project where the trace data is stored.

params.name: view
params.description:
Type of data returned for traces in the list. Optional. Default is
+MINIMAL+.

params.name: page_size
params.description:
Maximum number of traces to return. If not specified or <= 0, the
implementation selects a reasonable value.  The implementation may
return fewer traces than the requested page size. Optional.

params.name: start_time
params.description:
End of the time interval (inclusive) during which the trace data was
collected from the application.

params.name: end_time
params.description:
Start of the time interval (inclusive) during which the trace data was
collected from the application.

params.name: filter
params.description: An optional filter for the request.

params.name: order_by
params.description:
Field used to sort the returned traces. Optional. Can be one of the following:

  • +trace_id+
  • +name+ (+name+ field of root span in the trace)
  • +duration+ (difference between +end_time+ and +start_time+ fields of the root span)
  • +start+ (+start_time+ field of the root span)

Descending order can be specified by appending +desc+ to the sort field (for example, +name desc+).

Only one sort field is permitted.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

returns.description:
An enumerable of Google::Devtools::Cloudtrace::V1::Trace instances.
See Google::Gax::PagedEnumerable documentation for other
operations such as per-page iteration or access to the response
object.
